title: Optional use of the old HUD for players who prefer it
body: I have been playing League for a long time and in the last few months have turned away from it due to the new updated visuals , ect I defiantly prefer the old version as I was starting to develop into a much better player , but I cant quite get the hang of the new set-up I know some players enjoy the new HUD and whatnot but all I am suggesting is an option to revert back to the old one for players who prefer it.

replies.body:
I say yes, but recently I don't even play with a HUD i pressed a button by mistake so I have no hud (map allies spells etc.) can't see em so I can't play new champions or I can but I don't what spell I level. I did pref the old hud but since I can't see hud it don't bother me now.

P.S. Riot I would pref to know what button it was that removed the hud  so I can see spells and try new champions(It doesn't really bother me but only playing a small champ pool really sucks)
